name: SpaceReign
description:
You are called Neil and you was the astronaut behind NASA recently launch to get to Jupiter surface. You went past Mars, a bunch of alien spaceships stop you on the tracks. The main goal of the game is too get as much points as you can and brag about it to your friends.

Rules:

  • Shot down the alien spaceships
  • Shot down the boss alien spaceship
  • Try and survive

Controls:

Keys

     ● W - Move Up

     ● S - Move Down

     ● A - Move Back

     ● D - Move Forward

Mouse

  • Cursor - aim your weapon
  • Left click - Fire weapon
